overview.en: Vending Machine Chain (VMC) , is the world's first commercialized public chain for unmanned vending equipment, combining IoT technology and blockchain technology to create a blockchain + unmanned new retail solution.
overview.zh: 新零链（Vending Machine Chain），是全球首个针对无人自动售卖设备的商业化公有链，结合物联网技术与区块链技术，打造区块链+无人新零售解决方案。
